method.step: Wash the rice and drain water. Add the rice in pressure cooker pan. Add water and Cook the rice in pressure cooker for about 15 min (until 2 whistles).
When the cooker cools down, remove the rice (drain it, if the water is not yet absorbed) and keep it for cooling in a large plate.
Heat the ghee in a frying pan and add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add cloves powder, cinnamon powder and bay leaves.
Add the rice, add salt and stir it for 5 minutes.
Add chopped coriander and the rice is ready to serve. (Can serve to about 3 people. Can be consumed with Daal Fry or Moong Daal or Chole)
